roleset.name: to make formal
roleset.note: FORMALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'formalize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from formalize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Grobstein 's appointment formalizes a role [0] he has been performing [*T*-1]since the merger , a spokeswoman said [0] [*T*-2] .
example.arg: a role [0] he has been performing [*T*-1]since the merger
